classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
Easy logging
============

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/travis/Sgiath/easy-logging.svg
    :target: https://travis-ci.org/Sgiath/easy-logging

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/easy-logging.svg
    :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/easy-logging

.. image:: https://img.shields.io/codeclimate/github/Sgiath/easy-logging.svg
    :target: https://codeclimate.com/github/Sgiath/easy-logging

.. image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/easy-logging/badge/?version=stable
    :target: http://easy-logging.readthedocs.org/
    :alt: Documentation Status stable

.. image:: https://readthedocs.org/projects/easy-logging/badge/?version=latest
    :target: http://easy-logging.readthedocs.org/en/latest/
    :alt: Documentation Status develop


Easy logging package for python scripts

* Free software: MIT license
* Documentation: https://easy-logging.readthedocs.org

Why use easy-logging instead of logging
---------------------------------------

* Are you missing `verbose` logging level in official `logging
  <https://pypi.python.org/pypi/logging>`_ module?
* Do you want fancy colored logs (even in Windows CMD)?
* Do you want export logs in JSON format?

**If you answered at least one YES you are at the right place!!**

Features
--------

* Logs for python apps
* Six levels of logs importance (adds `verbose` level)
* Export all logs in JSON format


History
=======

0.1.0 (2016-02-13)
------------------

* First release on PyPI
info.name: easy-logging
